Name: BeerLeague Superstar
About the game: - Play 21 games through the 2020-2021 BeerLeague Season. - Customize your Appearance, Jersey, and Shoes with over 40+ Items. - Go Head-2-Head against 9 Unique Teams from the BeerLeague Universe. - Choose from 14 moves to learn and perfect. - Use your moves to earn Points, Rebounds, Assists, Steals, and Blocks Statistics. - Become an All-Star, Win the BeerLeague Championship, and prove you are a Superstar!
